attributes.action: Make NHS prescriptions free for all
attributes.background:
The NHS is supposed to be free for all at the point of use; however many are left paying extortionate monthly fees - even with a Prescription Prepayment Certificate - to access medication.

All prescriptions should be accessible for free for all who have access to free NHS treatment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Abolish prescription fees:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592147
